data.text:
――You want to get to know Air Shakur better...? 
Why bother asking me?
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer

data.text:
Word's gotten around about it, so I'm sure you heard, right? 
That I shouldn't have bothered, with how inscrutable she was. 
What's the point of...
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer

choices.text: Even if you don't understand her, I want to know.
choices.processed: <size=33>Even if you don't understand her, I want to know.</size>

data.text:
Given what happened that last time, I wouldn't get anywhere 
asking her directly. So I asked the people around her instead.

I asked about the path she'd walked, the actions she'd taken. 
Anything, anything at all. Thinking that one by one, these pieces 
would form the full puzzle.

choices.text: Please, tell me!

data.text: ...Hmmm?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Aah, it's you. I just sent you something, check it for me, will you? 
That's all, I'll be on my way.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

choices.text: W-wait, hang on...!
W-wait a second...!

data.text:
Checking my inbox, I saw she'd sent a massive amount of data. 
All of it looked like really complex research materials...
I managed to procure all this data from a deal with Shakur-kun. Take a good look at these graphs, these formulae. This is where her personality truly shines.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
It comes through in her writing, too. Logical and clinical, with no 
room for flourish. Despite the sense of aesthetic elegance that 
seems to pervade her work.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
It gives the impression of an absolute pragmatist, as impossible 
of a thing that is to be. ...Ah, you should know, the contents 
themselves may prove a bit too technical for you.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

choices.text: I'll give them a read anyway. Thanks.

data.text:
...I see. I won't elucidate anything for you, so you'll need to mull 
it over for yourself. I'm sure you'll wring some useful information 
out of it, so long as you make an honest effort.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

choices.text: Why are you helping me?
Why are you helping me?

data.text:
Oh, 'helping you' isn't quite right. It's merely my predilection as 
a scientist to guide the curious to knowledge they seek. 
Knowledge of her included.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
I kept on asking Umamusume and my senior trainers, and kept 
reviewing old footage, building my understanding of Air Shakur 
day by day.

(Gotta find a trainer soon. What's the point of requiring one to 
debut, anyway...? ...Guess now's too late to worry about it.)
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: A trainer, huh...
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: "You still want to win, don't you?"
"You still want to win, don't you?"

(Can't stand any of 'em anyway, so I guess there's no point being 
picky. Just gotta have a trainer on paper, so anyone'll do.)
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
(Though... I'm sick and tired of these clowns who think I'm 
'incomprehensible'. ...Plus, I already know how it's all gonna end, 
debut or not.)
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
...Yep, might as well just give it up now...
...
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You really going to give up?
Are you really going to give up?

data.text:
...Ngh. ...It's not exactly uncommon, you know. 
I'm just... quitting while I'm ahead.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
What's the point trying to win a shitty rigged-ass game? 
You'd have to be dumb as hell to try.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: But you're not dumb.
But you're not.

data.text: ...Yep. That's why I――
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You don't want to give up. Because you want to win.
choices.processed: <size=31>You don't want to give up. Because you want to win.</size>

data.text:
Having picked up the pieces she left, I think I understood, even 
just a little bit. Just how hard she was trying to win. So...

choices.text: You are not going to give up.
You are not going to give up.

data.text:
...Easy for you to say, thinking you've got it all figured out. 
I really hate that kinda surface-level crap.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You're right. I don't have anything figured out.
choices.processed: <size=35>You're right. I don't have anything figured out.</size>

choices.text: You're right. I don't have anything figured out.
choices.processed: <size=35>You're right. I don't have anything figured out.</size>

data.text:
I could spend my whole life trying, and never even catch a 
glimpse of the world reflected in her eyes. 
But I still wanted to know.

I wanted to talk with her, to help her win, if she'd let me. 
Even if we couldn't see eye to eye, I wanted to look forward 
together――

choices.text: I don't want to give up understanding you.
choices.processed: <size=39>I don't want to give up understanding you.</size>

choices.text: I don't want to give up understanding you.
choices.processed: <size=39>I don't want to give up understanding you.</size>

data.text:
You don't even know how to code. 
You act out on reasons as flimsy as your feelings. 
You are not like me.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
And you want to... understand me? How?
Understanding... How is that going to help me?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: I want to put in the effort to find out.
I want to put in the effort to find out.

data.text:
Even if that effort goes to waste...?
Even then?――
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: I want to be your trainer!
I want to be your trainer!

data.text:
...I really don't get you. 
What can you offer me?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: I have my merits.

data.text: Like what?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: I can watch you win!
I can watch you win!

data.text: ...Ngh.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
Having the privilege to witness to the victory she'd chased so 
obsessively. For a trainer, there is no greater reward.

...I'm really not getting through to you here, huh? 
From where I stand, there's no merit in working with you.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: But I can help you debut.

data.text: ...I just said I'm giving up. What's the point?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Just say the word and I'll be there.

data.text: ...I REALLY don't get you.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: "I don't want to give up understanding you."
"I don't want to give up understanding you."

(...What a stubborn pain in the ass. No, really, how the hell does 
you understanding help me?)
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
...Though, 
I guess I'm stubborn, too.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
(Still haven't found a way to get past that 7cm.
The reality of the situation hasn't changed, but...)
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: Might as well not give up.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
I ran into Air Shakur again that night. 
I kept an eye out from behind until she got back to school 
grounds, but...

――Excuse me. You've been following that girl for a while now. 
Can I have a moment?
data.name: Policewoman

data.text:
We've had reports of a suspicious individual tailing an 
Umamusume. Care to explain yourself at the station?
data.name: Policewoman

choices.text: N-No, I――
N-No, I――

data.text:
...Pfft.
Guess I gotta bail you out.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
Hey, lay off, lady. 
You got the poor sucker freezing up. 'Sides...
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
That sucker's my trainer.
...Ain't that right?
data.name: Air Shakur
